findings.title: Elevated Impact of Active Smart Contract Owner Privileges
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact on smart contract safety and security.
findings.location: HealTheWorld sol contract, active smart contract owner

findings.title: Centralization Risk Correlated to Active Owner
findings.description: Centralization risk correlated to the active owner is MEDIUM
findings.location: HealTheWorld sol contract, active smart contract owner

findings.title: Blacklisting of Certain Wallets
findings.description: Smart contract owner can blacklist certain wallets from interacting with the contract
findings.location: HealTheWorld sol contract, blacklisting function module

findings.title: Changing of Transaction Fees
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change transaction fees, which can be used to impose extraordinary transaction fees
findings.location: HealTheWorld sol contract, transaction fee changer function module

findings.title: Changing Max Transaction Limit
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max transaction limit, which can be set to zero
findings.location: HealTheWorld sol contract, max transaction limiter function module

findings.title: Changing Max Wallet Limit
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max wallet limit, which can be set to zero
findings.location: HealTheWorld sol contract, max wallet limiter function module

findings.title: Low Severity Functional Issue
findings.description: Smart contract has a low severity issue which may or may not create any functional vulnerability
